issue.body:

issue.title: chkaja.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.48.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://img.chkaja.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
`chkaja.com` is a personal blog domain. And `img.chkaja.com` is an image hosting domain. Block rules in filter make website can't show properly.  #146588

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

https://img.chkaja.com/5b67ffb95281096e.png</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![](https://img.chkaja.com/a8ebca1aaca86f01.png)</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: netcine.to
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://netcine.to](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnetcine.to) ### Comment > O site netcine.to est dando uma bela rasteira nos desenvolvedores do adguard, a principio o player do vdeo no roda com a presena do plug-in (Firefox, Chrome, edge) mesmo desativado > outro ponto importante que no apenas em um navegador, so quase todos que do suporte ao adguard. > no se trata de um bug do site, no se trata do bug de navegador, simplesmente usam uma falha.. se os outros sites comearem a usar isso, no vai servir pra nada um adblock. > > usando google translator: > > The site netcine.to is giving a beautiful creep in the developers of adguard, at first the video player does not run with the presence of the plug-in (Firefox, Chrome, edge) even disabled > another important point is that it is not only in one browser, it is almost all that support adguard. > it's not a site bug, it's not the browser bug, they just use a glitch. if the other sites start using this, it won't serve an adblock at all. > > ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ocYHl2x.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/7r6yQKl.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.55 Browser: | Edge Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese

comment.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot reproduce the issue with your settings.

Please try checking the filters updates, maybe it was already solved. If youre still able to reproduce the issue, reopen it here. Wed appreciate if you supply additional information or screenshots.

issue.body:
